external_games.name: Destiny 2: Season of the Splicer Silver Bundle

name: Destiny 2: Season of the Splicer Silver Bundle
summary: Purchase the Season of the Splicer Silver Bundle and receive the 'Reflecting Glass' Legendary Emote along with 1700 Silver (1,000 + 700 bonus Silver) which you can use to purchase Season of the Splicer, cosmetics, and more!
